amendment.description: To repeal State and local taxation exemptions applicable to the Federal National Mortgage Association and the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation.

action.text: Amendment SA 2651 ruled out of order by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2651.

Amendment SA 2651 proposed by Senator Sununu. (consideration: CR S13116, S13127; text: CR S13116) To repeal State and local taxation exemptions applicable to the Federal National Mortgage Association and the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2651 proposed by Senator Sununu.
